articles.author: Yael Halon
articles.title: Steve Hilton on rising Iran tensions: US should 'get the hell out' of Middle East
articles.description: Steve Hilton weighed in on rising tensions in the Middle East following an American drone attack that killed Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani early Friday.
articles.content:
Steve Hilton weighed in on rising tensions in the Middle East following an American drone attack that killed Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani early Friday.
"The West's involvement in the Middle East has been a disaster from the start... and finally, with Presid… [+3383 chars]

articles.author: Michael Goodwin
articles.title: Michael Goodwin: Democrats still delusional about Trump even after Qassem Soleimani death
articles.description: The calendar turns and a decade begins, but there is nothing new under the sun in Washington. Even the killing of an Iranian mass murderer is cause for more partisan strife.
articles.content:
The calendar turns and a decade begins, but there is nothing new under the sun in Washington. Even the killing of an Iranian mass murderer is cause for more partisan strife.

articles.author: William Sanchez
articles.title: Mo Rocca: Lives Worth Reliving
articles.description: This week, Martha was joined by Mo Rocca, author of Mobituaries: Great Lives Worth Reliving. Mo and Martha discuss how world leaders, famous actors and more.
